meta-review.comment: Animal Crossing: New Leaf offers a truly magical and charming experience that will captivate players for hundreds of hours. With its focus on forming friendships, clever humor, and relaxing gameplay, this entry in the series stands out as the best iteration yet. The familiar formula has been improved, and new features add to the overall enjoyment. It's a game that invites players to take a break from reality and immerse themselves in its delightful world.
